reasoning: Parotid oncocytoma represents approximately 0.05-1% of all salivary gland tumors with estimated incidence of ~0.05 per 100k. Peak incidence in 6th-8th decades. Data derived from small case series and institutional reviews; incidence estimates are sparse and based on tumor prevalence rather than systematic epidemiological tracking. Confidence limited by rarity and lack of population-based incidence studies.
source: Institutional salivary gland tumor case reviews and pathology literature
